name: autolevel
description: automatically connect levelup using database url

scripts.postpublish: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep \"version\" | head -1 | awk -F: '{print $2}' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && npm deprecate "autolevel@<${PACKAGE_VERSION}" "Rolling release, please update to ${PACKAGE_VERSION}"

author: Robin Bron <robin@finwo.nl>
